sudarman misha්ra badmintan tharagawaliye 04 wana kandaye shurathawaya dinaganu labuwa. 2014 warshaye pawathwu podu rajya mandaliya jyeshta tharagawaliye kewala, yugala ha kandayam anshaye dakshathama 08 dena atharatath 2016 warshaye pawathwu podu rajya mandaliya jyeshta tharagawaliye kandayam anshaye ridi padakkamath yugala anshaye lokada padakkamath jayaga්rahanaya kala. 2016 warshaye rusiyawe pawathwu loka wishwawidyala badmintan tharagawaliye kewala anshaye dakshathama 16 atharata paminimata da haki wuna. 2009, 2010, 2011 jyeshta badmintan tharagawaliye kewala anshaye ha yugala anshaye badmintan shuriya bawata path wuna, ee wagema pasal samayedi kanishta anshaye 11n pahala 13n pahala 15n pahala 17n pahala 19n pahala wayas simawanhi di nokadawa kewala ha yugala anshaye shurathawaya jayaga්rahanaya karanu labuwa. 2007 warshaye pawathwannata yedunu aariyadasa anusmarana bangmintan tharagawaliye 14n pahala misha්ra yugala ha kewala anshaye shurathawayath, wiwrutha anshaye kewala, yugala ha misha්ra yugala yana ansha paha ek ka්ridikawak dinagath warthawath sanituhan kirimata haki wuna.

di.wi.senewirathna wisin siya chithrapata kalawa granthaye sandahan karana 1901 yanna ehi mul satahanayi.me mathaya pasukalaka boho lipi sadaha mulashra kota ganna bawa penennaki.merata jiwath wu paranithama sinama lekhakayeku menma purogami mehewaraka yeduna senewirathnayan ge athdakim wishalaya.thawath mathayaka aththe eya 1903 wasara bawaya.1901 wasare merata chithrapata pradarshanaya pilibanda pawasana satahan wala aththe eya mulwarata thira gatha karana ladde diyathalawe pawathi yudha kandawure yannaya.me chithrapata pradarshanaya pawathwa aththe ewakata ehi sirakara siti boyar sirakaruwan sandahaya.boyar waru jiwathwuye dakunu aprikaweya.aprikawa brithanya kolaniyak wannata perathuwa eya athpath kara gena siti oolanda,jarmanu ha swidana jathin pasukalaka boyar warun lesa handinwuha.owun aprikawe padinchiyata aawe brithanyan ehi paminennata perathuwaya.
